titles.title: Do You Believe There Was A Man?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Do you believe there was a man
Who conquered every sin a man could face?
Do you believe that this same man
Won every war and captured every race?
Do you believe, do you agree,
That He slew death before His work was through?
Do you believe this man of strength
Can conquer anything that troubles you?
Chorus:
I do believe the things I see
I do believe the God who lives in me
My faith in You will be my guarantee
That I'll become all that I'm meant to be.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Do you believe that there will be
A people bold enough to end this age?
Do you believe that they will see
Their Master finally turn the final page?
Do you believe that there will be
A people rising to the Kingdom's call?
Do you believe that we're the ones?
Do you believe that we can end it all?
